string.value: The Dark Lord says that a small problem has risen. His expression seems to indicate that he is quite bothered. Go see the Dark Lord.

The Dark Lord says that a few strange incidents have been occurring recently. Although they are not serious, the frequency of the occurrences is bothering him.\r\nOne incident involves the thieving Shrooms who have infiltrated Kerning City. He needs someone to get rid of them by investigating them one by one, but there is no one who can be entrusted with this task. In order to gain the Dark Lord's trust, you volunteered to eliminate the #bShrooms#k...

The Dark Lord said that a few strange incidents have been occurring recently. Although they are not serious, the frequency of the occurrences is bothering him.
One incident involved the thieving Shrooms who have infiltrated Kerning City. He needed someone to get rid of them by investigating them one by one, so you volunteered for the task...

Although you eliminated 10 Shrooms, you were not able to find a suspicious Shroom. Still, the Dark Lord appreciated your hard work and displayed his trust towards you. You seem to have successfully gained his trust.

string.value: To solve the Dark Lord's problem, head to the #bKerning City Construction Site#k located to the left of Kerning City and eliminate the #bShrooms#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,300\r\nCan proceed to 'The Dark Lord's Trivial Problem 2' quest.\r\n
What is it?\r\n#L0##bYou appear as if something is bothering you. Is there something you're worried about...?#l\n#k
No, nothing you need to worry about. If you don't need anything from me, you're free to leave.\r\n#L0##bI don't need anything, but I just thought we could chat a bit.#l\n#k

Heh, aren't you the peculiar one? Most people rather talk to a tree bark than with me. Still, today is not a good day. So many little problems have been turning up in Kerning City these days. Those thieving Spores are especially giving me a headache.\r\n#L0##bI heard something about those thieving Spores too... From what I hear, they are making everyone miserable by stealing things and playing pranks.#l\n#k

Ah, so you're aware. Well, the stolen items are of negligible value, so that hasn't been too problematic. It's the pranks they're pulling on people that I'm worried about. They need to be stopped, but investigating every Spore in Victoria Island is out of the question... I'm not sure what to do. \r\n#L0##bWell, what if I took care of this for you? I don't have much to do right now, and I was planning on exploring Victoria Island anyway.#l\n#k
Hmm...really? This could be very time consuming... But if you really wish to help, I will entrust this job to you.

First, investigate #b10 Spores#k. They may be hiding something. The thieving Spore should be hiding a mask that was used during the crimes. I've been told that the Spores are appearing in large numbers at the #bKerning City Construction Site#k located left of Kerning City, so head there first.
No one else thought this was too much to handle, but I guess you are different.
You've returned. So, were you able to find a suspicious Spore?\r\n#L0##bWell... Unfortunately, I didn't have much success.#l\n#k
Well, I didn't expect that he would be found very easily. In any case, thank you for helping me. You are much more trustworthy than I first thought.
I will continue to trust you with tasks and ask for help when it's needed.
